member.name: T:ScrewTurn.Wiki.Plugins.PluginPack.MultilanguageContentPlugin
member.summary: Implements a Formatter Provider that allows to write multi-language content in Wiki Pages.

member.name: P:ScrewTurn.Wiki.Plugins.PluginPack.MultilanguageContentPlugin.PerformPhase1
member.summary: Specifies whether or not to execute Phase 1.

member.name: P:ScrewTurn.Wiki.Plugins.PluginPack.MultilanguageContentPlugin.PerformPhase2
member.summary: Specifies whether or not to execute Phase 2.

member.name: P:ScrewTurn.Wiki.Plugins.PluginPack.MultilanguageContentPlugin.PerformPhase3
member.summary: Specifies whether or not to execute Phase 3.

member.name: M:ScrewTurn.Wiki.Plugins.PluginPack.MultilanguageContentPlugin.Init(ScrewTurn.Wiki.PluginFramework.IHostV30,System.String)
member.remarks: If the configuration string is not valid, the methoud should throw a .

member.name: M:ScrewTurn.Wiki.Plugins.PluginPack.MultilanguageContentPlugin.Shutdown
member.remarks: This method might not be invoked in some cases.

member.name: P:ScrewTurn.Wiki.Plugins.PluginPack.MultilanguageContentPlugin.Information
member.summary: Gets the Information about the Provider.

member.name: P:ScrewTurn.Wiki.Plugins.PluginPack.MultilanguageContentPlugin.ExecutionPriority
member.summary: Gets the execution priority of the provider (0 lowest, 100 highest).

member.name: M:ScrewTurn.Wiki.Plugins.PluginPack.MultilanguageContentPlugin.PrepareTitle(System.String,ScrewTurn.Wiki.PluginFramework.ContextInformation)
member.summary: Prepares the title of an item for display (always during phase 3).

member.name: P:ScrewTurn.Wiki.Plugins.PluginPack.MultilanguageContentPlugin.ConfigHelpHtml
member.summary: Gets a brief summary of the configuration string format, in HTML. Returns null if no configuration is needed.
